sentences.english: Most people actually go with the play-it-safe option.
sentences.chinese: 大部分人会选择稳妥方案。

sentences.english: They mount to the hull and attach to the cowl easily and stay securely fastened when running.
sentences.chinese: 他们安装在船体和重视罩容易和住宿稳妥运行时。

sentences.english: The reform is taking place actively and stably on matters concerning the establishment of the joint share system and the joint stock cooperative system.
sentences.chinese: 要积极稳妥的进行股份制和股份合作制的改革。

sentences.english: It is, in fact, the only sure way of providing against the connexion.
sentences.chinese: 其实，这倒是预防他们之间结亲的唯一稳妥的办法。

sentences.english: Has there ever been a President who consistently pursued sound economic theory?
sentences.chinese: 有哪位总统曾持续遵循过一个稳妥的经济理论么？

sentences.english: I’m glad to have discovered the slow, sure path to wealth.
sentences.chinese: 我也很高兴自己发现了更慢，更稳妥的致富之路。

sentences.english: Reform will take place actively and steadily on matters concerning the establishment of the joint share system and the joint stock cooperative system.
sentences.chinese: 要积极稳妥地进行股份制和股份合作制的改革。

sentences.english: "and" boat never gets far from shore.
sentences.chinese: “稳妥”之船从未能从岸边走远。

sentences.english: It is safe to give the money to the bank for keeping.
sentences.chinese: 把钱交给银行保管是个稳妥的方法。

sentences.english: Steadily, Sasa suggests that you will route map printed on the invitation.
sentences.chinese: 稳妥起见，莎莎建议你将行车路线图印在邀请函上。
稳妥和可靠，意思是重复的。

sentences.english: Why, then, should they believe that auction-rate securities are as good as cash?
sentences.chinese: 为什么他们要相信拍卖利率债券会跟现金一样稳妥呢？

sentences.english: Reform will take place actively and steadily in matters concerning the establishment of the joint share system and the joint stock cooperative system.
sentences.chinese: 要积极稳妥地进行股份制和股份合作制的改革。

sentences.english: A draw would suit Peng, so she should have played more conservatively.
sentences.chinese: 和棋对彭来说是合适的，所以她应该下得更稳妥些。

sentences.english: And that's the best place for it to be as we seek to serve God!
sentences.chinese: 我们若力求事奉神，未来由神掌管是再稳妥不过了。

definition: motive/purpose/(sth) being the motive or purpose
to compromise/to take the middle road/a trade-off/eclectic
the best policy/the best thing one can do in the circumstances
